channel.title: MIL:LDO on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in MIL:LDO on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Iveco to Break Up With Sale of Company to Tata, Leonardo
item.description: Iveco Group NV agreed to break itself up, selling its defense unit to Leonardo SpA and the rest of the Italian truck maker to Tata Motors Ltd in deals totaling about €5.5 billion ($6.3 billion).

item.title: Iveco to Break Up With Sale of Company to Tata, Leonardo
item.description: Iveco Group NV agreed to break itself up, selling its defense unit to Leonardo SpA and the rest of the Italian truck maker to Tata Motors Ltd in deals totaling about €5.5 billion ($6.3 billion).

item.title: Iveco Defense Talks With Leonardo Advance, Pave Way on Tata Deal
item.description: Iveco Group NV is in advanced talks to sell its defense unit to Leonardo SpA, which would satisfy the demands of the Italian government and pave the way for a sale of the rest of the commercial trucki
